author: Phil
content: I’m 68, and I remember as a young boy, seeing small power boats with what looked like waterskis under the hull and the boats sitting high almost out of the water. Was that the beginning?

author: Ron Wilkinson
content: Fun to watch, funner than the cats and I like multihulls. AC has always been a rich man’s game like F1 racing. So when will we see small boats with foils? I think small open racing monohulls will happen pretty soon. Looks like fun and I think for fun’s sake someone will step up and design one.

author: Paul Cuenin
content: I think as carbon fiber becomes more affordable this technology will trickle down to other boats but it is going to take a while. I just think of how F1 tech slowly comes down to luxury cars and years later economy cars.
